resources.string:
"1. Select the source node.
" "2. Click on the start button.
" "3. Game automatically traverse you through the possible shortest path to the destination.
" "4. If it is not possible to reach the destination then it will simply show error message.
" "5. You can shuffle position of block nodes using shuffle button and restart the game.
"
"Note : It will move only in horizontal and vertical direction."
